named-native-query.name: BookingDetailView.getBooking
named-native-query.query: SELECT b.booking_id, b.status, bs.show_id AS show_id, bs.scheduled_at AS show_scheduled_at FROM booking AS b INNER JOIN show AS bs ON bs.show_id = b.show_id WHERE b.booking_id = :booking_id

named-native-query.name: BookingSummaryView.listBookings
named-native-query.query: SELECT b.booking_id, b.status, bs.show_id AS show_id, bs.scheduled_at AS show_scheduled_at FROM booking AS b INNER JOIN show AS bs ON bs.show_id = b.show_id ORDER BY b.id_ ASC OFFSET :offset FETCH NEXT :limit ROWS ONLY
